title: About Us
description:
TCM Logistic Services Inc. is independent company established in 2014. With our president who has over 25 years of experience in the logistics industry. TCM has become one of the fast growing logistic companies in San Francisco Bay Area. 
Passion, Flexible, Honest, and Responsive are TCM's company culture. Our employees are dedicated to provide real time and accurate service to our customer. With our strong experience and operation team, we will be able to response and solve issues immediately. 
As e-commerce era has rise, TCM works together with customer and e-commerce platforms such as Amazon and Walmart. With the ability to provide logistic total solution, we support our customer on B to B also B to C shipments and fulfillment. 
We consider our valuable customers as partners. Not only providing logistic services, but also make our customer's business grow stronger together!
